8de11c88-125d-44f4-8e03-16ec7c4e020d.description: You use Linux every day!” Smartphone Android, smartTV, IoT devices, professional servers, supercomputers and more and more desktop PCs... Today, anyone with a connection uses Linux, in more or less a conscious way. This is why we, at HackersGen, think that delving into the vast universe of GNU/Linux systems is never a waste of time. On the contrary, solid foundations on the subject lay a solid foundation for the professional future of every IT enthusiast.
8de11c88-125d-44f4-8e03-16ec7c4e020d.name: HackersGen Course - Linux Base

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of a 30-hour course of introduction to basic Linux concepts within the training platform www.hackersgen.com. The badge is issued to students who have passed the final test, which demonstrates that they have understood: Linux history and philosophy, installation, basic commands, filesystem structure, user, group and permissions management, permissions, openssh access management, hints of vim and redirection, verification and management of logs, package and networking management

aa2628b0-8d14-450e-8f05-6ac9395c0ca3.description: "Let's code!" From HTML to JavaScript,to CSS, SASS and with a view on Vue.js. Today, the figure of the Front End developer is one of the most sought after roles in the IT sector, so we at HackersGen have built an introductory training course for future professionals. Starting from the basics provided, together with the possibility of learning different tricks of the trade from Sorint.lab professionals, we are sure that "the client-side of the moon" will soon be in excellent hands.
aa2628b0-8d14-450e-8f05-6ac9395c0ca3.name: HackersGen Course - Front End Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of a 32-hour course that starts with the introduction of basic HTML/CSS concepts, experimentation of the SASS extension, and ventures into the JavaScript universe, with an initial mention of the open source Vue.js framework, held within the training platform dedicated to students www.hackersgen.com. The badge is issued to students who have passed the final test demonstrating mastery of the basics html, CSS, SASS, JavaScript and hints of Vue.js framework.

f9cd2846-bf2c-4ac3-ab4a-3555e8f6350e.description: Is the statement, "HTML (and CSS) is not a programming language!" true? We can think this is true, but this should in no way lead an aspiring developer to underestimate the fundamental impact that these languages have on the creation of web pages or level applications. In fact, we at HackersGen imagine them as the ideal starting point for any future Front End developer, as well as a fundamental skill when mastered with awareness.
f9cd2846-bf2c-4ac3-ab4a-3555e8f6350e.name: HackersGen Course - HTML & CSS

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of a 16-hour course that starts from the introduction to the basic HTML/CSS concepts and goes as far as a first use of the SASS extension, held within the training platform dedicated to students www.hackersgen.com. The badge is issued to students who have passed the final test demonstrating mastery of the HTML basics, the integration of CSS in it, and the use of the SASS extension as an alternative to the classic CSS sheet.

ee2faf12-f17d-4ff7-9075-a94d0b0ee71a.description: You use Linux every day!” Smartphone Android, smartTV, IoT devices, professional servers, supercomputers and more and more desktop PCs... Today, anyone with a connection uses Linux, in more or less a conscious way. This is why we, at HackersGen, think that delving into the vast universe of GNU/Linux systems is never a waste of time. On the contrary, solid foundations on the subject lay a solid foundation for the professional future of every IT enthusiast.
ee2faf12-f17d-4ff7-9075-a94d0b0ee71a.name: HackersGen Course "Excellent Commitment" - Linux Base

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of a 30-hour course of introduction to basic Linux concepts within the training platform www.hackersgen.com. The badge is issued to students who have passed the final test, which demonstrates that they have understood: Linux history and philosophy, installation, basic commands, filesystem structure, user, group and permissions management, permissions, openssh access management, hints of vim and redirection, verification and management of logs, package and networking management.

25b0c8e3-23e9-4689-858b-8013db7b9347.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated their skills in different IT technology areas through successfully completing the Summer Campus 2022 delivered by Sorint organization.This year the Summer Campus consists of 2 weeks of training on various technological areas with hints of DB, Linux, Virtualization, Storage, Cloud, Fullstack Development, Backup, Network and Security explained by professionals Sorint teachers
25b0c8e3-23e9-4689-858b-8013db7b9347.name: Sorint Summer Campus 2022

badge_template_activities.title: The earner had the opportunity to develop their knowledge also on specific technological areas such as development languages (Golang and JavaScript) – Cloud - Database (SQL e NoSQL) – OS (Linux, Docker and VM) – Network and Security in a real-world environment and actively utilised their skills in a setting where they have been able to receive feedback and develop, and shown consistency in approaches to first level problems.

76dc455d-aa32-4305-bc2c-883f640621da.description: Every employee is a startup, creativity becomes responsibility and passion leads to the achievement of goals: A Sircle is born. A democratic and widespread structure capable of rewarding initiative and the development of ideas: we value people, we bet on leaders, we bring out each one’s talent and we distribute responsibilities so that everyone can feel at the center of the company, in a nice company as Sorint wants to be.
76dc455d-aa32-4305-bc2c-883f640621da.name: Sorint.Lab Sircle - Sircle Leader

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the 30 steps pattern. In charge of the Sircle and the fulfillment of its mission; Leader of the team members and guarantor of their roles. Thinks positively, shows competence (built on experience, technical and methodological knowledge, as well as communicative and strategic skills) and lives up to reputation every day. Works with passion. Serves others and enables talents. A person's leadership capabilities come from both their attitudes and their actions.

9590af4b-c754-4e2d-96e6-289754be66b1.description: Is the statement, "HTML (and CSS) is not a programming language!" true? We can think this is true, but this should in no way lead an aspiring developer to underestimate the fundamental impact that these languages have on the creation of web pages or level applications. In fact, we at HackersGen imagine them as the ideal starting point for any future Front End developer, as well as a fundamental skill when mastered with awareness.
9590af4b-c754-4e2d-96e6-289754be66b1.name: HackersGen Course "Excellent Commitment" - HTML & CSS

The badge is issued to students who have passed the final test demonstrating mastery of the HTML basics, the integration of CSS in it, and the use of the SASS extension as an alternative to the classic CSS sheet.

4c1c982d-31d6-4a6a-90e4-b08bfdcac856.name: HackersGen Course "Excellent Commitment" - Front End Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of a 32-hour course that starts with the introduction of basic HTML/CSS concepts, experimentation of the SASS extension, and ventures into the JavaScript universe, with an initial mention of the open source Vue.js framework, held within the training platform dedicated to students www.hackersgen.com. The badge is issued to students who have passed the final test demonstrating mastery of the basics html, CSS, SASS, JavaScript and hints of Vue.js framework.

1b08be7d-dae4-4763-8c29-35cc7b0da1c7.description: Linux means power, stability and security within everyone's reach. Bash scripting is one of the tools used by SysAdmins to make the most of their systems. The objective of this 10-hour course is to explore with Sorint Lab professionals the open source operating system and its outstanding technological, focusing in particular on the topics "Bash Scripting" and "Security."
1b08be7d-dae4-4763-8c29-35cc7b0da1c7.name: HackersGen Course - Bash Scripting

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of 10 hours of live-streamed Linux course with specific focus on the topics "Bash Scripting" and "Security," within the HackersGen student training platform. The course is designed for students with prior knowledge of the philosophy, structure and basic shell usage in Linux. Badges are issued only to students who passed the final test on the topics: BASH and commands for sysadmin, BASH and commands for troubleshooting, BASH Scripting fundamentals, essentials of cybersecurity in Linux.

7b43db51-7d29-4d24-bb58-d384e6a630a6.description: Linux means power, stability and security within everyone's reach. Bash scripting is one of the tools used by SysAdmins to make the most of their systems. The objective of this 10-hour course is to explore with Sorint Lab professionals the open source operating system and its outstanding technological, focusing in particular on the topics "Bash Scripting" and "Security."
7b43db51-7d29-4d24-bb58-d384e6a630a6.name: HackersGen Course - "Excellent Commitment" Bash Scripting

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of 10 hours of live-streamed Linux course with specific focus on the topics "Bash Scripting" and "Security," within the HackersGen student training platform. The course is designed for students with prior knowledge of the philosophy, structure and basic shell usage in Linux. Badges are issued only to students who passed the final test on the topics: BASH and commands for sysadmin, BASH and commands for troubleshooting, BASH Scripting fundamentals, essentials of cybersecurity in Linux.

24e2368b-de09-4562-ab89-eb331e399ec4.description: Application modernization is the process of converting a legacy application to have a modern architecture and technology stack. The workshop is designed to highlight the function of application modernization and understand how this approach to software development can support digital transformation in the company and lead to the transformation of monolithic architectures into cloud-native applications based on microservices.
24e2368b-de09-4562-ab89-eb331e399ec4.name: Application Modernization

badge_template_activities.title: Participant

a546a988-f92e-4289-87c5-1e385c8244c7.description: IT methodologies in the era of Devops, Cloud and Continuous Delivery. Workshop designed to introduce CxO, IT Architects and technicians to the use of the DevOps methodology in order to meet business needs. Sorint.Lab was founded by Gianfranco Marilli in 1985.
a546a988-f92e-4289-87c5-1e385c8244c7.name: DevOps Methodology

badge_template_activities.title: This workshop is designed to introduce an overview of IT methodologies in the era of Devops, Cloud and Continuous Delivery by understanding the trends, products and advantages of the DevOps methodology. An introduction to the best practices related to the Agile methodology is also provided.

8e6961b4-69f0-4e6a-bc63-a4174f91b4ae.description: Golang is an open source programming language developed by Google. Vaguely inspired by C, statically typed and equipped with fast compilation, it is designed for the development of systems such as server/web applications, middleware and databases, and supported by an extensive library system that facilitates the creation of simple and reliable software, thus also suitable for flexible and modular mobile desktop applications.
8e6961b4-69f0-4e6a-bc63-a4174f91b4ae.name: HackersGen Course - "Excellent Commitment" INTRODUCTION TO GOLANG

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of 10 hours of Golang course including live streaming labs within the HackersGen student training platform. At the end of the course, the badge was issued only to students who passed the final test, thus demonstrating that they understood: history and uses of the language, CLI, modules, packages, syntax, testing, uses of Web API.

2bd5a4fa-e7bf-41a9-a30c-e90ca6845546.description: The event aims to provide basic informations to understand the skills you need to become a Cloud Architect and introduce CI / CD best practices in the Google environment.
2bd5a4fa-e7bf-41a9-a30c-e90ca6845546.name: Cloud Architect

badge_template_activities.title: Event participation

7265f9e5-4d1b-4def-afda-099763b2273b.description: PostgreSQL is a complete object-oriented DBMS released under a free licence. Compared to the classic MySQL, it is better suited to managing complex situations and is therefore increasingly competitive in the IT market. The objective of the 10-hour course is to deepen together with Sorint Lab professionals the basic theoretical and practical knowledge of the famous database and its main uses.
7265f9e5-4d1b-4def-afda-099763b2273b.name: HackersGen Course - "Excellent Commitment" LET'S LEARN PostrgreSQL

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of 10 hours of PostgreSQL course including live streaming labs within the HackersGen student training platform. At the end of the course, the badge was issued only to students who passed the final test, thus demonstrating that they understood: the foundations of relational DBs, how to move nimbly in the database using the terminal, basics of the SQL language, users, schema, accesses, Join, backups.

d4b1903f-a34c-47f8-85d7-f31bbaffb1f7.description: Born as a simple tool to facilitate Linux kernel development, GIT has become one of the most widely used version control tools in the world. The objective of the 3-hour course is to introduce students to the GIT distributed version control tool and the GITHUB hosting platform.
d4b1903f-a34c-47f8-85d7-f31bbaffb1f7.name: HackersGen Course - GIT & GITHUB

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of a 3-hour GIT ondemand course within the HackersGen student training platform. The course was designed to introduce students to project management using the GIT versioning system software. The badge was only issued to students who passed the final test, demonstrating that they understood: history and philosophy behind GIT, managing a repository, main commands and commits, branching, merging, management from GitHub.

9564496f-400d-45e6-b99f-52d35d5c5281.description: Golang is an open source programming language developed by Google. Vaguely inspired by C, statically typed and equipped with fast compilation, it is designed for the development of systems such as server/web applications, middleware and databases, and supported by an extensive library system that facilitates the creation of simple and reliable software, thus also suitable for flexible and modular mobile desktop applications.
9564496f-400d-45e6-b99f-52d35d5c5281.name: HackersGen Course - INTRODUCTION TO GOLANG

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of 10 hours of Golang course including live streaming labs within the HackersGen student training platform. At the end of the course, the badge was issued only to students who passed the final test, thus demonstrating that they understood: history and uses of the language, CLI, modules, packages, syntax, testing, uses of Web API.

9daec163-a03c-4d72-b4e3-a68b0d95106f.description: Every employee is a startup, creativity becomes responsibility and passion leads to the achievement of goals: A Sircle is born. A democratic and widespread structure capable of rewarding initiative and the development of ideas: we value people, we bet on leaders, we bring out each one’s talent and we distribute responsibilities so that everyone can feel at the center of the company, in a nice company as Sorint wants to be.
9daec163-a03c-4d72-b4e3-a68b0d95106f.name: Sorint.Lab Sircle - Reporter

badge_template_activities.title: The Reporter is the refence point for communication in the Sircle. Through their contribution, they give visibility to what happens in their Sircle to all Sorintians. The Reporter also gives the most important updates about Sorint’s activities to their teams. To achieve this role it is necessary to create a post or video presentation of your Sircle after completing the 5 Kanban steps

607d5ade-dced-4280-ba66-253d2beda4d2.description: Born as a simple tool to facilitate Linux kernel development, GIT has become one of the most widely used version control tools in the world. The objective of the 3-hour course is to introduce students to the GIT distributed version control tool and the GITHUB hosting platform.
607d5ade-dced-4280-ba66-253d2beda4d2.name: HackersGen Course - "Excellent Commitment" GIT & GITHUB

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of a 3-hour GIT ondemand course within the HackersGen student training platform. The course was designed to introduce students to project management using the GIT versioning system software. The badge was only issued to students who passed the final test, demonstrating that they understood: history and philosophy behind GIT, managing a repository, main commands and commits, branching, merging, management from GitHub.

16a9f456-09ab-4576-843a-e463e10bd32f.description: The aim of the 6-hour course is to introduce students to the essential concepts of JavaScript. From syntax through variables, functions, instructions, loops, objects, arrays... to the web APIs and the DOM, all by developing a few small projects together!
16a9f456-09ab-4576-843a-e463e10bd32f.name: HackersGen Course - JavaScript basics

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of a 6-hour ondemand JavaScript course within the HackersGen student training platform. The course was designed to introduce students to the basics of the programming language. The badge was only issued to students who passed the final test, demonstrating that they understood: the history and philosophy behind JavaScript, its syntax, variables, instructions, loops, errors, arrays, objects, DOM and the management of a first project.

170e5b06-d660-45b4-ae3b-b2d26e646924.description: School Contest “Premio Gianfranco Marilli” winners Category: Classi III, IV - Passion for life, curiosity in everything, desire to think beyond, tenacity, creative responsibility, great courage, ability to make big dreams come true. Young people always at the centre providing them with tools and opportunities to study and grow, to listen to their ideas, to bring out their talent, to guide them along a path of great open-mindedness: Gianfranco Marilli founded Sorint in 1985
170e5b06-d660-45b4-ae3b-b2d26e646924.name: Download Innovation - School Contest 2021

badge_template_activities.title: Winners in this category have developed the most original and innovative project during the school year. They have demonstrated high competence in designing and developing an original and innovative idea.

cfddfa60-a62f-472b-b412-80fd24de152c.description: Every employee is a startup, creativity becomes responsibility and passion leads to the achievement of goals: A Sircle is born. A democratic and widespread structure capable of rewarding initiative and the development of ideas: we value people, we bet on leaders, we bring out each one’s talent and we distribute responsibilities so that everyone can feel at the center of the company, in a nice company as Sorint wants to be.
cfddfa60-a62f-472b-b412-80fd24de152c.name: Sorint.Lab Sircle - Security Enabler

badge_template_activities.title: Security Enabler is responsible to improve the security posture of the entire Sircle, by applying the general security rules suggested globally making them effective considering the Sircle activity. Every Sircle may have its own peculiarities and security constraints. That's why the mental agility, patience and all other skills are required to succeed in the role, to improve Sorint.lab security as a whole.

6e40e30e-c64c-4e22-85c2-59a563f6dc77.description: Il badge è stato assegnato agli studenti vincitori della sfida di problem solving in ambito informatico “The Bad Sower”, tenutasi nel corso della prima edizione dell’evento dedicato a studenti di informatica “The HackersGen Event”. La sfida, che ha coinvolto diversi team provenienti da oltre 30 Istituti Superiori Italiani, è stata organizzata dai professionisti dell’azienda SORINT - leader nell’innovazione tecnologica - appositamente per la community della piattaforma formativa HackersGen.com.
6e40e30e-c64c-4e22-85c2-59a563f6dc77.name: HackersGen 2022 "The Bad Sower" - Winner

badge_template_activities.title: La sfida è iniziata a Settembre 2022 con la richiesta di risolvere 3 prove di difficoltà crescente. La risoluzione delle prove portava ad un indirizzo e-mail che serviva di fatto per accedere alla fase finale in presenza. La sfida finale da completare in un’ora e composta da una parte “software” (reversing di un algoritmo di crittografia) e una “hardware” (patching del firmware di un Arduino) ha impegnato i partecipanti sia da un punto di vista tecnico che organizzativo.

3b55fa43-e6d1-4ee2-a1ef-7a6d57843c88.description: "Scrum is not a process or a technique for building products; rather, it is a framework within which you can employ various processes and techniques." - Jeff Sutherland, The Scrum Guide. The objective of the 5-hour course is to introduce students to SCRUM, an Agile framework for managing the software development cycle.
3b55fa43-e6d1-4ee2-a1ef-7a6d57843c88.name: HackersGen Course - Agile SCRUM

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of a 5-hour ondemand SCRUM course within the HackersGen student training platform. The course was designed to introduce students to the framework and the management of software projects according to its principles. The badge was only issued to students who passed the final test, thus demonstrating that they understood: history and philosophy behind SCRUM, organisation of a SCRUM team, values, roles, events, artefacts.

8a210f2a-a1c0-4baa-99ed-10d2ca06f80a.description: Hackathon winners Category: "Best Project Realization" - Passion for life, curiosity in everything, desire to think beyond, tenacity, creative responsibility, great courage, ability to make big dreams come true. Young people always at the centre providing them with tools and opportunities to study and grow, to listen to their ideas, to bring out their talent, to guide them along a path of great open-mindedness: Gianfranco Marilli founded Sorint in 1985
8a210f2a-a1c0-4baa-99ed-10d2ca06f80a.name: Download Innovation - Hackathon 2021

badge_template_activities.title: Winners in this category have delivered the best project implementation during the 48-hour nonstop development challenge. They have demonstrated high levels of competence in project realization.

From syntax through variables, functions, instructions, loops, objects, arrays... to the web APIs and the DOM, all by developing a few small projects together!

The badge was only issued to students who passed the final test, demonstrating that they understood: the history and philosophy behind JavaScript, its syntax, variables, instructions, loops, errors, arrays, objects, DOM and the management of a first project.

4a5c5708-28a5-44d5-b611-2270116492f2.description: Every employee is a startup, creativity becomes responsibility and passion leads to the achievement of goals: A Sircle is born. A democratic and widespread structure capable of rewarding initiative and the development of ideas: we value people, we bet on leaders, we bring out each one’s talent and we distribute responsibilities so that everyone can feel at the center of the company, in a nice company as Sorint wants to be.
4a5c5708-28a5-44d5-b611-2270116492f2.name: Sorint.Lab Sircle - Academier

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the 5 Steps pattern to become an Academier. Has demonstrated responsibility and focus toward one's accountabilities. The Academier is responsible for training the core members of the Sircle. Based on the Sircle's growth strategy, together with the Sircle Leader identifies skill gaps. Plans, builds and delivers training paths with Global Academia to improve the Sircle knowledge. Global Academia globally manages Sorint.Lab's internal training management functions.

93141cd6-3126-4007-909b-19dee234fce8.description: Il badge è stato assegnato agli studenti che hanno sviluppato il progetto "Musical Twin", 1° classificato alla V edizione dello school contest "Premio GF Marilli", categoria III-IV superiore. L'edizione 2022 del contest organizzato dall'azienda SORINT - da più di 35 anni leader nell’innovazione tecnologica - ha coinvolto 30 progetti caratterizzati dal tema “Innovazione” in ambito informatico, frutto della fantasia e/o didattica dei partecipanti, provenienti da Istituti Superiori di tutta Italia.
93141cd6-3126-4007-909b-19dee234fce8.name: HackersGen School Contest 2022 - Winner (III - IV)

badge_template_activities.title: Lo school contest ha coinvolto gli studenti a partire dal mese di aprile 2022.Superata la prima fase di selezione, gli studenti sono stati impegnati per tutto il periodo estivo nello sviluppo effettivo del progetto. Nel mese di ottobre 2022 sono stati selezionati i progetti finalisti del contest e la giuria ha espresso la propria valutazione sui requisiti di: originalità, difficoltà tecnica, qualità della documentazione e della presentazione, spendibilità, maturità del progetto.

1404eb08-e29f-4966-b09f-6bfd6e4f01d0.description: Every employee is a startup, creativity becomes responsibility and passion leads to the achievement of goals: A Sircle is born. A democratic and widespread structure capable of rewarding initiative and the development of ideas: we value people, we bet on leaders, we bring out each one’s talent and we distribute responsibilities so that everyone can feel at the center of the company, in a nice company as Sorint wants to be.
1404eb08-e29f-4966-b09f-6bfd6e4f01d0.name: Sorint.Lab Sircle - Talent Handler

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the 5 Kanban steps. Has demonstrated responsibility and focus toward one's accountabilities. Has shown participation in achieving the objectives of the Sircle Sprints. Takes care of the Talents and of updating the Sircle core members CVs, as well as their own. Constructively participates on the Wetalk channel of the Talent Handlers. Is personally tasked with the interviews for his Sircle and carries out active searches on the various recruitment platforms

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of a 5-hour ondemand SCRUM course within the HackersGen student training platform. The course was designed to introduce students to the framework and the management of software projects according to its principles. The badge was only issued to students who passed the final test, thus demonstrating that they understood: history and philosophy behind SCRUM, organisation of a SCRUM team, values, roles, events, artefacts.

2dada551-e658-4440-b34d-dbb3b48efd0d.description: Il badge è stato assegnato agli studenti che hanno sviluppato il progetto “Dispensa”, 2° classificato alla V edizione dello school contest "Premio GF Marilli", categoria III-IV superiore. L'edizione 2022 del contest organizzato dall'azienda SORINT - da più di 35 anni leader nell’innovazione tecnologica - ha coinvolto 30 progetti caratterizzati dal tema “Innovazione” in ambito informatico, frutto della fantasia e/o didattica dei partecipanti, provenienti da Istituti Superiori di tutta Italia.
2dada551-e658-4440-b34d-dbb3b48efd0d.name: HackersGen School Contest 2022 - Second Place (III - IV)

badge_template_activities.title: Lo school contest ha coinvolto gli studenti a partire dal mese di aprile 2022.Superata la prima fase di selezione, gli studenti sono stati impegnati per tutto il periodo estivo nello sviluppo effettivo del progetto. Nel mese di ottobre 2022 sono stati selezionati i progetti finalisti del contest e la giuria ha espresso la propria valutazione sui requisiti di: originalità, difficoltà tecnica, qualità della documentazione e della presentazione, spendibilità, maturità del progetto.

4e3e8654-5cd3-4efc-8b12-e27f2ef5ce6a.description: Il badge è stato assegnato agli studenti che hanno sviluppato il progetto "Keen Readers", secondo classificato alla V edizione dello school contest "Premio GF Marilli" per la categoria V superiore. L'edizione 2022 del contest organizzato dalla SORINT - da più di 35 anni leader nell’innovazione tecnologica - ha coinvolto 30 progetti caratterizzati dal tema “Innovazione” in ambito informatico, frutto della fantasia e/o didattica dei partecipanti, provenienti da Istituti Superiori di tutta Italia
4e3e8654-5cd3-4efc-8b12-e27f2ef5ce6a.name: HackersGen School Contest 2022 - Second Place (V)

2c2dc9d3-4d28-4068-af66-444be18a199d.description: Il badge è stato assegnato agli studenti che hanno sviluppato il progetto "IPAAS", 1° classificato alla V edizione dello school contest "Premio GF Marilli", categoria V superiore. L'edizione 2022 del contest organizzato dall'azienda SORINT - da più di 35 anni leader nell’innovazione tecnologica - ha coinvolto 30 progetti caratterizzati dal tema “Innovazione” in ambito informatico, frutto della fantasia e/o didattica dei partecipanti, provenienti da Istituti Superiori di tutta Italia.
2c2dc9d3-4d28-4068-af66-444be18a199d.name: HackersGen School Contest 2022 - Winner (V)
